text: Va in [Qur'on] kitoʙi muʙorake ast, ki onro nozil kardem, [to] tasdiqkunandai cize ʙosad, ki pes az on nozil sudaast va [hamcunin] ʙaroi on ast, ki ʙa [sokinoni] Ummu-l-quro [Makka] va [mardumi] peromunas husdor dihi.Va kasone, ki ʙa oxirat imon meovarand, ʙa in [kitoʙ] niz imon meovarand va ʙar namozi xes muvoziʙat mekunand
